start: No way! I'm not going near that copier. I heard it killed those guys.
It wasn’t the copier, it was the fax machine, duh.
QUIT BITCHING! I need those copies now!
Hey, you weren’t the one who had to mop up the entrails. You know what they say about bowels and-
Well, it’s true. My mop will never be the same.
Ooh, even more sheep to the slaughter!
You know, you’re not doing a great job of selling this wholesale murder of innocents thing.
Hope you enjoy an eternity of rock pushing and SyFy reruns. I’m only trying to help you.
Okay, okay. Actually, that manager is pretty shrill.
I bet if she really raised her voice it might send everyone flying...
end: I'm not sure I want to do this anymore...
Well, you can always hang out with that manager you just offed.
I'm sure she'll have a lot to yell at you about.
